title: And how do you feel at the end of the week?
creator_credit: Filmedia (Australia), Productivity Promotion Council of Australia, John Filmer-Mason and Kara Feldman
brief_description: Billy works in a factory and is dissatisfied with his job. His girlfriend works in a shop and has remedied the deficiencies in her work situation to make her job challenging and meaningful. Shows the relationship between job satisfaction and performance and how employees and management can communicate to create a more productive work environment.
